metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition
metadata.notes: Section 9.36 contains comprehensive energy efficiency requirements. Calgary is in Climate Zone 7A (5000+ HDD). The NECB 2020 may also apply depending on building type.

requirements.description: This Section applies to energy efficiency requirements for buildings within the scope of Part 9
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to energy efficiency requirements for buildings within the scope of Part 9

requirements.description: Compliance with energy efficiency requirements may be achieved through prescriptive requirements in Subsections 9.36.2 to 9.36.5
requirements.exact_quote: Compliance with energy efficiency requirements may be achieved through prescriptive requirements in Subsections 9.36.2 to 9.36.5

requirements.description: Compliance may alternatively be achieved through performance modelling demonstrating equivalent or better energy performance
requirements.exact_quote: Compliance may alternatively be achieved through performance modelling demonstrating equivalent or better energy performance

requirements.description: Calgary is located in Climate Zone 7A with approximately 5000 heating degree days
requirements.exact_quote: Climate zones are determined by heating degree days. Zone 7A applies where HDD are between 5000 and 6000

requirements.description: Building envelope assemblies shall meet the thermal performance requirements of this Section
requirements.exact_quote: Building envelope assemblies shall meet the thermal performance requirements of this Section

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for above-grade walls in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, above-grade walls shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 4.31

requirements.description: Minimum nominal thermal resistance for above-grade walls in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, above-grade walls shall have a nominal thermal resistance of not less than RSI 5.45

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for ceilings below attics in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, ceilings below attics shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 10.43

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for cathedral ceilings and flat roofs in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, cathedral ceilings and flat roofs shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 6.91

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for basement walls in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, basement walls shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.98

requirements.description: Basement wall insulation shall extend from the top of the wall to the basement floor
requirements.exact_quote: Basement wall insulation shall extend from the top of the wall to the basement floor

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for slab-on-grade edge insulation in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, slab-on-grade edge insulation shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.84

requirements.description: Minimum width of slab-on-grade perimeter insulation measured from edge
requirements.exact_quote: Slab-on-grade perimeter insulation shall extend not less than 1200 mm horizontally from the slab edge or vertically to the footing

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for floors over unheated spaces in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, floors over unheated spaces shall have an effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 5.02

requirements.description: Maximum overall thermal transmittance (U-value) for windows in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, windows shall have an overall thermal transmittance (U-value) of not more than 1.40 W/(m2K)

requirements.description: Maximum overall thermal transmittance (U-value) for doors in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, doors shall have an overall thermal transmittance (U-value) of not more than 1.40 W/(m2K)

requirements.description: Minimum energy rating for windows in Climate Zone 7A
requirements.exact_quote: Windows in Climate Zone 7A shall have an energy rating (ER) of not less than 25

requirements.description: Maximum fenestration and door area as percentage of gross wall area
requirements.exact_quote: The total area of windows, doors, and skylights shall not exceed 22% of the gross wall area

requirements.description: Maximum skylight area as percentage of gross ceiling area
requirements.exact_quote: The total area of skylights shall not exceed 2% of the gross ceiling area

requirements.description: Maximum air leakage rate for the building envelope
requirements.exact_quote: The building envelope shall have an air leakage rate of not more than 2.5 air changes per hour at 50 Pa pressure difference

requirements.description: Air tightness shall be measured in accordance with CAN/CGSB-149.10
requirements.exact_quote: Air tightness shall be measured in accordance with CAN/CGSB-149.10

requirements.description: Minimum annual fuel utilization efficiency (AFUE) for gas furnaces
requirements.exact_quote: Gas furnaces shall have a minimum annual fuel utilization efficiency (AFUE) of 95%

requirements.description: Minimum annual fuel utilization efficiency (AFUE) for gas boilers
requirements.exact_quote: Gas boilers shall have a minimum annual fuel utilization efficiency (AFUE) of 90%

requirements.description: Minimum heating seasonal performance factor (HSPF) for air-source heat pumps
requirements.exact_quote: Air-source heat pumps shall have a minimum heating seasonal performance factor (HSPF) of 8.2

requirements.description: Supply and return air ducts shall be sealed to minimize air leakage
requirements.exact_quote: Supply and return air ducts shall be sealed to minimize air leakage

requirements.description: Duct joints shall be sealed with mastic, tape, or other approved sealants
requirements.exact_quote: Duct joints shall be sealed with mastic, tape, or other approved sealants

requirements.description: Minimum thermal resistance for duct insulation in unconditioned spaces
requirements.exact_quote: Ducts in unconditioned spaces shall be insulated to a minimum RSI of 1.32

requirements.description: Minimum sensible heat recovery efficiency for HRVs at 0 degrees C
requirements.exact_quote: Heat recovery ventilators shall have a minimum sensible heat recovery efficiency of 70% at 0 degrees C

requirements.description: Heat recovery ventilators shall conform to CAN/CSA-C439
requirements.exact_quote: Heat recovery ventilators shall conform to CAN/CSA-C439

requirements.description: Heating systems shall be controlled by programmable or smart thermostats
requirements.exact_quote: Heating systems shall be controlled by programmable or smart thermostats capable of setting different temperatures for different times of day

requirements.description: Minimum energy factor for gas water heaters
requirements.exact_quote: Gas water heaters shall have a minimum energy factor of 0.67

requirements.description: Minimum energy factor for electric water heaters
requirements.exact_quote: Electric water heaters shall have a minimum energy factor of 0.93

requirements.description: Minimum insulation thickness for hot water supply pipes
requirements.exact_quote: Hot water supply pipes shall be insulated with not less than 25 mm of insulation

requirements.description: At least 80% of interior lighting power shall be high-efficacy lighting (LED or equivalent)
requirements.exact_quote: Not less than 80% of interior lighting power in dwelling units shall be provided by high-efficacy lighting

requirements.description: Exterior lighting shall be controlled by automatic devices such as motion sensors or timers
requirements.exact_quote: Exterior lighting shall be controlled by automatic devices such as motion sensors, timers, or daylight sensors

requirements.description: Performance compliance shall be demonstrated using approved energy modelling software
requirements.exact_quote: Performance compliance shall be demonstrated using approved energy modelling software

requirements.description: The proposed design shall have annual energy consumption not exceeding that of a reference building complying with prescriptive requirements
requirements.exact_quote: The proposed design shall have annual energy consumption not exceeding that of a reference building complying with prescriptive requirements
